parameters: GabText I should say goodbye to \n[2] before leaving
Do you two have any idea where to start?
I thought as much. Youngsters just running out without thinking too far ahead.
North of here is a mountain, \c[14]Mt Coronet\c[0].
There's a small mountain settlement there called
You'll find someone called \c[14]Shiki\c[0], a man known for his great insight.
I've heard rumours that he's over 130 years old, but I personally don't believe it.
Anyways, he should have some valuable information you two need, so \c[3]Chimura Village\c[0] should be a good place to start.
Huh, you seem to be pretty knowledgeable yourself!
Hey I've been around for a while. Can't expect me to sit around knowing nothing!
Here's some supplies for the trip. It's not much, but business hasn't been thriving much.
Also, keep in mind that the mountains have become dangerous recently. The wildlife has gotten a bit\..\..\.. wild lately.
(Just like in the Glenn Woods... I wonder whats going on?)
You, sir, are the best person I've met yet!
Oh it's nothing. You have no idea how much you're helping me out by protecting \n[2] for me!
Well then, you two ought to be all prepared now!
I'll be right here if you need me!
'Scale Mt Coronet to reach Chimura Village'
Don't tell me you went into the forest again!
How many times do I have to tell you! The forest has become dangerous, and I don't know what I'll do if I lose you too!
You, you must be the man \n[2] said she found in the forest!
It was you wasn't it! You encouraged her to follow you there!
Dad no! It was my idea! \n[1] had nothing to do with it!
I just don't want to see you put yourself in any danger.
And I'm tired of you babysitting me around like I'm still a small child!
I just wish Mom was still here!
Umm... Sir... I'm terribly sorry for intervening in your personal problems...
You're lucky I'm a kind man at heart.
I won't force you to sleep outside in the cold.
I'll prepare you a bed for tonight.
But by tomorrow, I hope to see you leave just as suddenly as you had arrived.
Did you forget where you have to go?
I was expecting better of you two.
North of here is a mountain, \c[14]Mt Coronet\c[0].
There's a small mountain settlement there called
You'll find someone called \c[14]Shiki\c[0], a man known for his great insight.
He should have some valuable information you two need, so \c[3]Chimura Village\c[0] should be a good place to start.
Well then get to it! No point in loitering around!
Did you forget where you have to go?
I was expecting better of you two.
North of here is a mountain, \c[14]Mt Coronet\c[0].
There's a small mountain settlement there called
You'll find someone called \c[14]Shiki\c[0], a man known for his great insight.
He should have some valuable information you two need, so \c[3]Chimura Village\c[0] should be a good place to start.
Well then get to it! No point in loitering around!
Well, looks like morning just couldn't wait a few more hours!
Oh, right, that means it's go time.
Well I guess I'll say my goodbyes and hit the road.
